sentences.sContent: In 1530 it meant to paralyze, deaden, stupefy, to stun or deprive of sensation, as by a blow.
sentences.sContent_eng: In 1530 it meant to paralyze, deaden, stupefy, to stun or deprive of sensation, as by a blow.
sentences.sCn: 1530年，它的意思是使人瘫痪、麻木、失去知觉、昏迷或者丧失感觉，就好像被人猛打了一顿。

sentences.sContent: When I’ve posted this I’ll go &have a Turkish bath &stupefy my nerves in sweaty duration. My person is developing dirty habits.
sentences.sContent_eng: When I’ve posted this I’ll go &have a Turkish bath &stupefy my nerves in sweaty duration. My person is developing dirty habits.
sentences.sCn: 寄出这封信后我就要去洗土耳其浴，让我的神经在汗流浃背的折磨中麻木一下，我的肉体正在养成不少肮脏的习惯。

remMethod.val: stup(笨， 呆) ＋ efy → 吓呆 → 使惊讶

words.tran: 目瞪口呆的；呆若木鸡的
使人目瞪口呆的；让人昏沉的
昏迷的，不省人事的；无感觉的
使发呆；使失去知觉（stupefy的ing形式）
